description:
Home sweet home
Your search is over. This delightful home is in excellent condition and set on a beautifully landscaped 780m2 block. Ready for someone to move straight in. It has 3 bedrooms, master with ENS and WIR, sunken lounge, large dining area and a study. There is plenty of storage in the garage and there is side access for a boat, caravan or trailer. A securely fenced garden provides a safe haven for children or pets. Perfectly positioned with rural views and just a short distance to the school, shops and transport. It is well suited for a young family. An inspection will not disappoint.

SECLUDED & SUSTAINABLE
ONCE IN A LIFETIME OPPORTUNITY! Selected as the site for a sustainable Prison Farm by the Victorian Government in the early 20th Century because of its outstanding water source and rich alluvial soils, this 550 acre (222 ha) property is the premium freehold location on the Island. Surrounded by the 11,000 hectare French Island National Park and with approximately 1.6 km of its own secluded beach frontage and potential to reinstate your own private jetty (S.T.G.A.), this property represents a unique opportunity to enjoy the ultimate private lifestyle only 70 kms from central Melbourne. Alternatively, the existing accommodation with huge commercial kitchen and hotel license could be enhanced and continued as a tourist operation or school camp.
Water is provided by a huge dam on Brella Creek plus two bores and numerous storage tanks. There are four acres of wetland, a 140 acre pine plantation ready for harvest, 3 acres of organic garden, an 1100 metre long airstrip on site, a robust off grid power system with solar panels and generator back up.
Infrastructure remaining from the Prison days includes a guest house that sleeps 30, a commercial kitchen which can cater for 100,
2 additional accommodation blocks sleeping up to 70 each, 2 older style shower blocks/toilets, a three bedroom caretakers residence with bay views,
recreation hall with stage and adjacent library room, an abattoir to process beef grow on site, a 9 hole golf course (in need of restoration), Cricket ground and much more.
For Sale as a going concern with opportunity to enter into separate contact for business which would include grazing stock, plant and equipment, furniture, a half cabin boat, forward bookings etc.
Current zoning is the highest available on the Island and allows for almost any tourist, religious or educational use (S.T.G.A.).

Titled and Fully Fenced Land Ready
No. 3 Buttonwood Way in Grantville on Eastern Shores Estate offers full Colorbond fencing and a level rectangular block of 501 m2 approx. Eastern Shores is arguably the most conveniently located estate in Grantville, a short walk to all township amenities including Post Office, Chemist and Medical Centre, a range of cafes and best of all the Foreshore area with Pier and coastal walking trails. With a 14. 2 m frontage and a generous 37.5 m depth, this titled block offers home owners flexibility when designing their new home. The estate has various lot sizes right up to over an acre so it will have a unique character once fully built on. With a treed reserve along one boundary, Eastern Shores feels like you are in the country yet you have all town amenities. Priced to sell and ready to build on, a great opportunity.

address: Lot 24 Grantville-Glen Alvie Road Grantville VIC 3984
description:
Lot 24 - Final Stage of Eastern Shores
Lot 24 Grantville-Glen Alvie Road, 620 m2
Eastern Shores Estate last and FINAL land release is underway with Titles expected early 2018. The land enjoys views towards the sea and the woodland nature reserve next to the estate. Land sizes vary and the land whilst mostly flat has some elevated lots which will capture views. This is the final stage of land release in Grantville at present so get in early to secure your lot. Eastern Shores is located minutes stroll away from all the shops and services in Grantville which include a Post Office, Newsagency, Council Offices, Medical Centre, Ambulance station and Chemist. There are a number of Cafes and fast food outlets and a Bakery. Grantville is approx. 20 mins from San Remo, 30 mins from Wonthaggi and Cowes and approx. 35 mins from Cranbourne and Pakenham. There is an excellent new Early Childhood campus beside the popular Bass Valley Primary School and there are multiple Secondary School options in the locality. A V- Line Bus runs regularly to Melbourne and beyond into Gippsland. The township is growing rapidly but land is running out just as fast!
Deposit of $500 is due upon signing contracts with the balance of 10% deposit within 21 days. The balance will be due within 14 days of the Titles being issued by the Land Titles office.
Contact Liz Leahy for more information on 0487 022 099

PRISTINE & PICTURE-PERFECT WITH BAY FRONTAGE
Welcome to The Anchorage
Where can you find magnificent waterviews on 40 beautiful waterfront acres, with an immaculately presented 3 bedroom home, for under a million dollars? ...Right here on 5th Street, French Island.
This wonderful property has all the luxurious features of a modern city lifestyle including main and ensuite bathrooms, Caesar-stone kitchen bench-tops, 2-drawer dishwasher, reverse-cycle air-conditioner, quality wood heater, total off grid power system, polished timber floors, front and rear decks, picturesque gardens, long tree-lined driveway, orchard, chicken coup and a double garage.
This is the perfect place to put your feet up and enjoy your island lifestyle with a glass of local pinot, or a cuppa whilst watching the birdlife, or the boats in the bay.
Call local agent Phil Bock for more information and start planning your deserved, peaceful lifestyle away from all the noise, but close enough to want for nothing.

BACK ON MARKET - Poolside Grandeur on 2 Acres
This expansive sandstone residence is bursting with appeal ? catering for the biggest of families with flowing floorplan, swimming pool, ample shedding and 2 acres space for the kids to run, play and explore.
The home comes with 6 bedrooms including master with walk-in robe and huge ensuite with double vanity, overlarge shower and huge bath. Remaining 5 bedrooms are well placed and accessible to the well-sized, bright family bathroom with separate toilet.
The kitchen is the perfect social zone with wide expansive bench space, an abundance of storage, 900mm stainless steel free-standing stove plus second 600mm oven, and dishwasher.
An abundance of living zones means the family can come together of an evening, or have their own space to relax and unwind in peace and quiet. The formal lounge has a private study off it, perfect for the home office. Spacious open plan living and dining is the heart of the home, separate rumpus room at the rear of the home provides the kids with their own living area - a multipurpose room with impressive glass doors out to the pool ? ideal for outdoor entertaining, a gym, man cave or games room.
The pool is sizable with shade sails to protect the kids, the slide into the pool with ensure you?re a hit with the kids? friends and you?ll be the place to be in summer.
Set on 2 acres with no neighboring homes, ample car storage, huge decked area and veranda - huge 18x7.5m workshop and shed - currently set out as a factory is ideal for the home business.
Other notable features include gas log fire heating, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, extra shedding for pool and play equipment for the kids.

IMMACULATE HOME ON HUGE 1017m2 BLOCK
Serious vendors are moving on and invite expressions of interest by 4pm Friday 23rd December 2016. This charming home offers so much more than a new home, in excellent condition set on a whopping 1017m2 block and with plenty of side access, lovely established gardens, solar panels, shedding, carports, bird averies, chicken coop and so much more. Attractively presented brick veneer home with a very large light and bright living area, country kitchen with dishwasher and dining area leading to a semi enclosed entertainment deck. There is a spacious entry, three generous bedrooms and a central bathroom. Outside this property has loads of appeal with immaculate easy care gardens, two carports, two sheds, chicken enclose, bird averies, fish pond, space for children to play, space for a granny flat (stca) and a big shed and more space. A pleasure to inspect and look forward to being the proud owners of this stunning home.

GREAT LOCATION - METRES TO WATER !!!!
This large, North facing block of approx. 888 sqm is situated in an exclusive coastal estate surrounded by quality homes. The block has a very slight undulation and, if you build a two-storey home, you would most likely get bay views.
Located within a couple of minutes of the 24 hour boat ramp, pier and jetty, local shop, community centre, tennis courts, lawn bowls, park and VLine bus service. A primary school, kindergarten and cafe are approx. 7 mins. Major shopping centre approx. 25 mins away, Phillip Island approx. 20 mins and the CBD approx. 1 hr 20 mins with dual lane highway.
Offering scenic coastal walks this block is a must to inspect.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 401986966

NEW LAND RELEASE
Exclusive Court in the Grantville township
- Close to shops and waterfront
- Essential services such as Doctors, Ambulance, Bank and Post Office located within the town centre
- Local School and Kindergarten approx. 7 mins
- Commutable to all major centres and Phillip Island
- V-Line and local bus services available to/from Melbourne/Wonthaggi
- Sunset Court offers you the opportunity to buy or build the home of your choice
- Architect designed plans and prices are available to build on the various sites.
The choice is yours...............

Property Code: 401987175

FORESHORE COTTAGE - RENOVATOR'S DELIGHT!!
Set on approx 700sqm in a peaceful location surrounded by natural bush land and within walking distance to the beach, this quaint 2 bedroom cottage is a renovator's delight.
Consisting of 2 bedrooms, a large bathroom, lounge with wood heater, spacious kitchen and laundry. Recently been painted and new carpet, this cottage is waiting for you to add your personal touch.
With a fully fenced yard, there is ample space to store a boat and caravan and plenty of running room for the family dog.
This property is located in a very unique no thru road on the Grantville Foreshore and is close to local shops, schools, public transport and is only 20 minutes to major shopping centre and Phillip Island.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 401987217

Ultimate rural lifestyle or retreat
30 acres of sandy loam just outside Lang Lang township.
An opportunity to run horses, cattle, other livestock, with underground water lines suitable for vegetables, flowers or hothouses. This property has three dams, stock bore and 50000ltr water storage tank.
- 4 Bedrooms and Study.
- Formal Lounge with Wood Heater and A/C.
- Rumpus Room or Billiard Room.
- 20m X 6m Showroom and Work Room with kitchen.
- 3kw Solar that can be upgraded.
Beautiful ranch style home with lots of living areas and wide verandahs.
This property has a massive amount of shedding and is divided into paddocks.
For an immediate inspection call Colin Butler.

Australian Homestead Packed with Features
This 4 bedroom Australian homestead style home offers extensive decking under bullnose verandas where you can enjoy afternoon sun all year round. The home is very spacious and has well defined separate large rooms common to the Australian homestead style. The lounge room has a solid fuel wood heater and split system air-conditioner and the home also has an evaporative cooling system. There is a separate dining room adjacent to the kitchen which has a walk in pantry, a new dishwasher and a pleasant view of the hedged garden. There are 4 bedrooms with the master bedroom fitted with robes and a large ensuite bathroom. The home is packed with extras including 16 solar panels, a new hot water service with heat pump, evaporative cooling and a heat exchange system to distribute warm air from the Coonara heater. There is a new Rinnai gas heater so you are spoilt for choice with heating and cooling options.
The home has aluminium shutters on remote switches and good quality security screens allowing you to lock the house up tight if away from home and these also help make the home so economical to heat and cool.
The bull-nosed veranda covers 2 sides of the home and there is a tandem 2 car carport and misc. shedding.

PRESTIGE BLOCK IN RAPIDLY GROWING ESTATE
This sensational parcel of land nestled in a quiet, sought – after beach side estate, is offering 566sqm in a stunning estate. With the foreshore at the end of the street, walking tracks & 24 hour boat ramp only minutes away. Delivering a premium coastal lifestyle with easy access to the general store, park, community center, tennis courts, primary school, kindergarten & all bus services. The block is complete with underground power supply & has been maintained to the highest standard & only 90 minutes from Melbourne CBD!
Build a two story dwelling you will then secure panoramic views of Westernport Bay and French Island.
Looking for a sea change to build your dream home then this prestige’s block is worth a look. Agent available 7 days a week.

Ready To Move In
Just been completed, this 3 bedroom brick veneer home, on its own title. Approx 341m2, master with ensuite and walk in robes. 2nd & 3rd with built in robes, 9 ft ceilings. Security system, 5kw 12 solar panels, spacious kitchen, pantry gas oven, lots of bench space and cupboards.
1 car garage, with remote concrete driveway.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 402977007

THE AUSTRALIAN DREAM!
Make the move to your own beautiful farmlet, in picturesque Bass, only a 5 minute drive from the Island.
With almost 5 acres and a very smart and comfortable brick and tile home, you can spend your time as you wish! Maybe some gardening, with approx half the property planted with beautiful established trees and landscaped garden beds. The paddock area at the rear is just the right size for a pony or two, great for the kids!
The house is spacious and welcoming, with plenty of room for the whole family, a choice of different zones creates a flexible standard of living with a formal lounge, open plan living/dining room and a versatile sunroom for cooler weather. A large central kitchen connects these living areas.
In true Aussie fashion, a long covered verandah is the spot to relax, overlooking the garden. This place is a hidden gem, just waiting to be discovered and well worth an inspection, make a call today.

Tenby Point For Sale
291 acres, in three titles, all with coastal frontage: 56 acres, 140.6 acres and 96 acres
About 1.35 kms of north facing, coastal frontage.
Title to the high water mark, fronting sandy beaches, a cave and the Tenby Point Jetty ruins.
Flat gently rising land, with generally, sandy loam soils, with established pastures, fences, stockyards, an old home(about 40m from the beach), shearing shed, hay Shed, machinery shed and a historic Chicory Kiln.
Sealed road frontages to Guy Road and Marine Road.
Bore water and Dams.
Mains water and Sewerage available.
Steeped in local history.
3.5kms to Primary school, 4kms to Corinella shop, 8.2 kms to Grantville, 23 kms to Phillip Isand and 109kms to Melbourne (two sets of traffic lights).
A unique opportunity for this outstanding property, that was purchased in 1972.
Expressions of Interest, close Thursday 1st December at 4pm.

Immaculate Home So Close to the Water
Located on the corner of Beach Street and 150 m from Corinella?s only sandy beach this beautifully presented, character filled home also provides access in minutes to Corinella?s renowned coastal walking tracks and other town amenities. Upon inspection you will find a home which is beautifully presented and retains some of the character aspects of its period such as high ceilings and picture rails. Ideal as a permanent or holiday home, the owners have done all the hard work including easy care floating floors in all traffic areas, quality carpet and drapes, all in immaculate condition. The bathroom, 2nd toilet and kitchen have been recently updated and add to the amenity of the property. The 3 bedrooms offer more than average space and the large lounge room with split system heating/cooling is centrally located in the home. The established, low maintenance garden with its beautiful shady trees, including a stunning apricot flowering gum and private covered rear deck shows the care and attention bestowed inside continues outside. The 10m x 3.5m secure garage with its 4.8m wide access from Beach St will meet every fisherman or tradies? needs with a 2.4m high clearance roller door, power and concrete floor.
This home offers a break from the rush and frenzy of suburban living and with all the hard work done provides an uncomplicated, no effort required entry into the idyllic Corinella lifestyle.

address: 169 Ten Chain Road French Island VIC 3921
description:
ABSOLUTELY SPECTACULAR POTENTIAL "THE SLIPWAY"
Your private beach haven.
Situated on the south coast of the Island only 6 kms from the passenger ferry. Enjoy the water-frontage to your 100+ acres of pasture currently grazing sheep with good shelter trees, fenced to 5 main paddocks plus 3 smaller holding paddocks and 4 dams. Huge 585 m² American style barn with 48m² first floor deck with water views, large carport, some smaller sheds and a shipping container. Practical, steel Cattle yards, roofed heritage listed Chicory Kiln, boat mooring channel just off shore and two fantastic building envelope positions affording magnificent in your face water views - one over 20 meters above sea level, both spanning almost 180 degrees across Westernport Bay to Phillip Island.
This really is an unusual opportunity to secure a sought after combination of property features, (100+ ACRES, WATER-FRONTAGE, WATER-VIEWS, MOORING AVAILABILITY, AIR-STRIP SPACE, QUALITY PASTURE) so close to Melbourne, but exclusively isolated!
Mortgagees Auction Saturday 26th November @ 2:30pm at the Agents office.
Contact Phil Bock for inspection and details
Terms 10% Deposit Balance 60 days Vacant Possession.

Edwardian style 4 bedroom home, 1 acre fronts beach reserve.
Character filled home with lots of timber paneling inside & lead light windows. Rear fence adjoins the foreshore reserve & is a very easy walk to the sandy beach.
The modern 10 month old kitchen(dishwasher, electric cooking, 2 pack cupboards) has views of water plus French Island in distance. Lounge with high ceilings inc. lots charm of built in shelves, cupboards, split system, wood heater... plus view towards Western Port Bay. 3 bedrooms have BIR's & 2 have stained glass windows plus doors to outside. Bathroom is very classy with gold plated taps!! Laundry with 2nd toilet. 3 forms of heating & 2 of cooling!!
Other features:- self contained 2 bedroom cottage, 4.5 kw of solar panels, 12m x 9m fully enclosed shed with power & concrete floor, wood shed & electric opening front gate. Property has town water & sewerage. Potential 2 lot sub division STCA. Double carport & caravan/boat carport.
Inspect this soon to see the great location and value!!

Find Peace Living In Nature
Living and owning a house these days usually means you cannot do anything without the neighbours having a sticky beak and knowing all your business, unless of course you buy a home on acres of land and with that comes all those dollar signs. With this property your neighbour is nature!!! Set next to your very own bushland which is complete with a running creek, let mother nature and all her glory be your neighbour as you live your life.
This unique 3 bedroom home needs to be seen to get a real feel for everything it has to offer with the ground floor hosting all living areas, kitchen, laundry and bathroom. The 1st floor is where you will find the bedrooms with the main bedroom having its own ensuite complete with laundry shoot, the middle bedroom would suit a young child perfectly and the lucky person calling shot gun on bedroom 3 will enjoy their very own porch which will give you an astonishing glimpse of the ocean as you cast your eyes through the tree line. Just when you walk through and think you have seen it all there is an almost hidden stair way to the attic which could be used for what your heart desires. If all this is not enough just picture yourself on the decked pergola area laying in a hammock or having family and friends over enjoying all that nature has to offer. Call today to find out more.

A fabulous Find - Approx 3.3 Acres
A very appealing small acreage situated just off the Bass Hwy in a secluded setting with a superb Rural vista with distant bay views on approx 3.3 acres. Rural fencing to 3 sides, electricity, mains water and telephone available to the property. Ideal to establish your dream hobby farm with heaps of room for the caravan, boat & cars. Space for children to run around and play. Short distance to the Bass Valley Primary School. Only a short drive to the jetty, boat ramp & beach. Come and enjoy the beauty of the Bass coast region.
